content: **knitted mittens in 1 strand drops fiesta and 2 strands drops kid-silk ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see rainbow reach hat pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #rainbowreachmittens drops design pattern fs-037 yarn group b + a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l/xl circumference 16-19-19 cm length 25-26-27 cm **yarn** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-50-50 g colour 22 fairyland and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25-25 g colour 56 marzipan **needles** drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm **knitting gauge** 15 stitches in width and 19 row in height with stocking stitch and 3 strands on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/261-17-rainbow-reach-hat
